info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 20 at 3:56PM PDT until September 20 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHWESTERN CLARK COUNTY... At 356 PM PDT, local law enforcement reported water rescues in the Green Valley area. Up to 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Henderson, Anthem, Green Valley, Paradise, Enterprise, Silverado Ranch, Seven Hills and Henderson Executive Airport. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
